pageHeadline: Simplified communication and intuitive controls, before anything else.
processHeadline: Following process to make sure we deliver design that actually serves you

process.processText: We dive deep into the problem we're trynig to solve and we define it.
We set a key message, structure of information and strategy to achieve understanding.
We prepare a visual concept to make sure we're on the same page.
After we agreed on a concept and strategy, we proceed to make it all happen.

ProcessHeadline: Following process to make sure we deliver design that actually serves you
